attributes.action: Require the resignation of the Home Secretary and the Police involved in the arrest of Damian Green
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe the arrest of a serving MP by police officers acting upon information from a Civil Servant to be the most serious breach of Parliamentary Procedure for three centuries.  We call upon the Prime Minister to require the resignation of the Home Secretary and, through the Home Secretary, the acting head of the Met Police and the Senior Officer in charge.

rejection.details:
There are several petitions in existence already:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Greenarrest/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
